text: Ngkhyungla khai xawia mkhyäp päng te am ngkhyungla khai xawia ti beki xawia mawngma üng: kpami naw akdawa am a vecawhpüi üng a ngaihnak am nängei üngta khyumah kawm. Kakawngki xawia am kya.7:36Ngkhyungla xawi; a hlüei ta; am ani üngkpami ja am ceimah hamki a cangla: akdawa am a vecawhpüi lü a canglaa sak a xam hnüh üngta ceimahsak kawm.
